pages.text: $(italic)The zombies you encounter every day wear lots of valuable equipment. But when they die, it disappears never to be seen again.$(br2)No problem if you manage to snatch it from them while they are still alive. Gotcha!

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Small chance for mobs (and other players!) to drop their equipment when hit.$(br2)Max Level: 2$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a common Book with Disarming by surrounding your Enchanter with Pigment and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Disarming from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more Pigment and Experience for each additional level.
